column2: Yes, hello, can I help you?
speaker: Heather

old:
さー、食べて飲んで
楽しくいきましょ！
column2: Well, let's eat and drink and have fun!
speaker: Heather

old:
皆の楽しそうな顔を見てると
私も幸せな気持ちになってくるわ
こういう場があるって、大事だよね！
column2:
Seeing everyone's happy faces makes me happy too

It's important to have a place like this!
speaker: Heather

old:
キャリーちゃんのご飯、もう食べた？
元気の源、補充していってね！
column2:
Have you eaten Carrie's food yet?
Please replenish the source of your energy!
speaker: Heather

old:
私は大食堂の元の姿を知ってるから――
初めて奪還後のココを見た時は
ちょっとショック受けちゃった
column2:
Because I know what the Cafeteria looked like in its original form--
When I first saw this place after it was recaptured, I was a little shocked.
speaker: Heather

old:
大食堂の復旧、頑張ろうね！
ティネス砦の名物だったんだから
column2: Let's do our best to restore the dining hall! It was the pride of Fort Thines, after all.
speaker: Heather

old:
ああ、早く人がいっぱいの
元通りの大食堂で働きたいな――
column2: Oh, I can't wait to work in a big cafeteria full of people, back to normal--
speaker: Heather

old:
キャリーちゃん、無理してないかな
大丈夫かな――
column2: Carrie, are you sure you're not pushing yourself too hard? I hope you're okay--
speaker: Heather
